data.text: @CrainsChicago Living in Lightfoot Paradise was the worst thing that happened to Chicago children.
@CrainsChicago Mayor Lightweight can claim whatever she wants. She will go down as the worst mayor in many decades. Hopefully a one term disaster.
@CrainsChicago @AlexNitkin What a waste of my vote....I believed in her.

@CrainsChicago She started off really sensible and practical. And she was likable in those memes. Then she closed access to the lakefront. Never really coordinated w/Pritzker. Covid is under control unfortunately crime isn’t
@CrainsChicago So why is downtown still dead?

@CrainsChicago You all bought into this crap- pop up stores on the Magnificent Mile- yeah make it into Las Vegas before the big casinos demolished all that on the strip. Bull crap about black deaths and Covid - have you seen an answer for the homeless on the streets?

Lastly, the mayor says 2021 was one of the best years in Chicago's history for business and investment. 170+ companies made "pro-Chicago" decisions last year. She also points to progress made in the Invest South/West initiative.
@CrainsChicago Totally disagree. Not a bad seat anywhere. The issue is one of limits … limited use, seasons, capacity.  Chicago needs a change of leadership and a refreshed vision
